entry.title: Monday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 20.
entry.summary: Sunny. Becoming a mix of sun and cloud near noon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 20. Wind chill minus 43 this morning and minus 27 this afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 06:00 AM AST Monday 16 January 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Mainly cloudy. Low minus 24 with temperature rising to minus 13 by morning.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Becoming cloudy this evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 24 with temperature rising to minus 13 by morning. Wind chill minus 32 this evening. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 06:00 AM AST Monday 16 January 2023
